title: Moldova Overnight Deposits Rate
description: Deposit Interest Rate in Moldova remained unchanged at 19.50 percent in November from 19.50 percent in October of 2022. Deposit Interest Rate in Moldova averaged 3.95 percent from 2001 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 19.50 percent in August of 2022 and a record low of 0.15 percent in November of 2020. The Deposit Interest Rate is the average rate paid by commercial banks to individuals or corporations on deposits. This page includes a chart with historical data for Deposit Interest Rate in Moldova.
author: National Bank of Moldova
